description: Golden dataset with 50 policy questions and expected answers for Regulus accuracy testing (>90% requirement)

test_cases.question: What is the maximum vacation time allowed per year?
test_cases.expected_answer: Employees are entitled to a maximum of 25 vacation days per calendar year.

test_cases.question: What are the guidelines for employee conduct during meetings?
test_cases.expected_answer: Employees must maintain professional behavior, avoid interrupting others, and keep discussions relevant to agenda items.

test_cases.question: How should confidential information be handled?
test_cases.expected_answer: Confidential information must be stored securely, shared only with authorized personnel, and never discussed in public areas.

test_cases.question: What is the process for reporting workplace harassment?
test_cases.expected_answer: Report harassment immediately to HR or use the anonymous hotline. All reports will be investigated promptly and confidentially.

test_cases.question: What are the remote work eligibility requirements?
test_cases.expected_answer: Employees must have manager approval, maintain productivity standards, and have appropriate home office setup.

test_cases.question: How many sick days are provided annually?
test_cases.expected_answer: Employees receive 12 sick days per calendar year, which can be carried over up to 5 days to the next year.

test_cases.question: What is the dress code for client meetings?
test_cases.expected_answer: Business professional attire is required for all client meetings, including suits and appropriate footwear.

test_cases.question: What are the data backup requirements?
test_cases.expected_answer: All critical data must be backed up daily to approved cloud storage with 30-day retention minimum.

test_cases.question: How should expense reports be submitted?
test_cases.expected_answer: Expense reports must be submitted within 30 days with original receipts through the company portal.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on personal use of company equipment?
test_cases.expected_answer: Limited personal use is permitted during breaks, but no personal software installation or inappropriate content access.

test_cases.question: What training is required for new employees?
test_cases.expected_answer: New employees must complete orientation, compliance training, and role-specific training within first 30 days.

test_cases.question: How are performance reviews conducted?
test_cases.expected_answer: Performance reviews are conducted annually with mid-year check-ins using standardized evaluation criteria.

test_cases.question: What is the social media policy for employees?
test_cases.expected_answer: Employees must not share confidential information and should include disclaimers when posting about work topics.

test_cases.question: What are the requirements for overtime authorization?
test_cases.expected_answer: Overtime must be pre-approved by manager and documented in timekeeping system within 24 hours.

test_cases.question: How should workplace accidents be reported?
test_cases.expected_answer: Report accidents immediately to supervisor and safety officer, complete incident report within 24 hours.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on professional development funding?
test_cases.expected_answer: Company provides up to $2000 annually for approved professional development with manager approval.

test_cases.question: What are the guidelines for email communication?
test_cases.expected_answer: Use professional tone, clear subject lines, and appropriate recipient lists. Avoid reply-all unless necessary.

test_cases.question: How long is the probationary period for new hires?
test_cases.expected_answer: New employees have a 90-day probationary period with evaluation at 30, 60, and 90 days.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on confidentiality agreements?
test_cases.expected_answer: All employees must sign confidentiality agreements and annual renewals covering proprietary information protection.

test_cases.question: How should customer complaints be handled?
test_cases.expected_answer: Acknowledge within 24 hours, escalate to management if needed, and document resolution in CRM system.

test_cases.question: What are the requirements for travel expense reimbursement?
test_cases.expected_answer: Submit receipts within 30 days for pre-approved business travel with itemized expense report.

test_cases.question: What is the process for requesting time off?
test_cases.expected_answer: Submit requests at least 2 weeks in advance through HR portal with manager approval required.

test_cases.question: What are the cybersecurity requirements for passwords?
test_cases.expected_answer: Passwords must be at least 12 characters with mixed case, numbers, symbols, and changed every 90 days.

test_cases.question: How should conflicts of interest be disclosed?
test_cases.expected_answer: Disclose potential conflicts immediately to manager and compliance officer using disclosure form.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on workplace diversity and inclusion?
test_cases.expected_answer: Company promotes inclusive environment with equal opportunities regardless of background or identity.

test_cases.question: How should intellectual property be protected?
test_cases.expected_answer: All work-related innovations belong to company and must be disclosed through invention disclosure process.

test_cases.question: What are the guidelines for vendor selection?
test_cases.expected_answer: Use approved vendor list, obtain multiple quotes for purchases over $5000, and follow procurement process.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on employee referral bonuses?
test_cases.expected_answer: Employees receive $1000 bonus for successful referrals who complete 90-day probation period.

test_cases.question: How should emergency evacuations be conducted?
test_cases.expected_answer: Follow designated evacuation routes, assemble at designated areas, and await all-clear from safety wardens.

test_cases.question: What are the requirements for document retention?
test_cases.expected_answer: Retain financial records 7 years, employee records 5 years after termination, and contracts 3 years after expiration.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on working from home equipment?
test_cases.expected_answer: Company provides laptop and monitor; employee responsible for ergonomic setup and internet connectivity.

test_cases.question: How should quality issues be escalated?
test_cases.expected_answer: Report quality issues immediately to quality assurance team and document in quality management system.

test_cases.question: What are the guidelines for client entertainment expenses?
test_cases.expected_answer: Client entertainment limited to $150 per person with business purpose documentation required.

test_cases.question: What is the process for software license requests?
test_cases.expected_answer: Submit software requests through IT portal with business justification and budget approval.

test_cases.question: How should personnel changes be communicated?
test_cases.expected_answer: HR announces personnel changes via company newsletter with appropriate lead time and transition planning.

test_cases.question: What are the requirements for contractor agreements?
test_cases.expected_answer: All contractors must sign confidentiality agreements and comply with company security policies.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on personal phone calls during work?
test_cases.expected_answer: Personal calls should be limited to breaks and lunch periods except for emergencies.

test_cases.question: How should environmental incidents be reported?
test_cases.expected_answer: Report environmental incidents immediately to safety officer and document in environmental management system.

test_cases.question: What are the guidelines for company vehicle use?
test_cases.expected_answer: Company vehicles for business use only, maintain valid license, and report accidents immediately.

test_cases.question: What is the process for internal job transfers?
test_cases.expected_answer: Submit transfer request with manager approval, meet position requirements, and complete transition period.

test_cases.question: How should budget variances be handled?
test_cases.expected_answer: Report budget variances over 5% to finance team with explanation and corrective action plan.

test_cases.question: What are the requirements for safety equipment?
test_cases.expected_answer: Use appropriate PPE for job tasks, inspect equipment regularly, and report damaged equipment immediately.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on competitive intelligence?
test_cases.expected_answer: Gather competitive information through legal means only, no unauthorized access to competitor systems.

test_cases.question: How should customer data be protected?
test_cases.expected_answer: Customer data must be encrypted, access-controlled, and handled according to privacy regulations.

test_cases.question: What are the guidelines for team meetings?
test_cases.expected_answer: Schedule meetings with agenda, start/end on time, and distribute minutes within 24 hours.

test_cases.question: What is the process for equipment maintenance?
test_cases.expected_answer: Schedule preventive maintenance annually, report issues immediately, and use only approved service providers.

test_cases.question: How should project deadlines be managed?
test_cases.expected_answer: Set realistic timelines, track progress weekly, and escalate delays to project manager immediately.

test_cases.question: What are the requirements for supplier audits?
test_cases.expected_answer: Conduct annual supplier audits for critical vendors focusing on quality, compliance, and security.

test_cases.question: What is the policy on knowledge sharing?
test_cases.expected_answer: Document processes in knowledge base, conduct regular training sessions, and mentor new team members.

test_cases.question: How should regulatory compliance be maintained?
test_cases.expected_answer: Monitor regulatory changes, update policies annually, and conduct compliance training quarterly.
